title: Album Page, "Château de Coucy", June 1, 1887
medium: Graphite on gray paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
markings: Embossed paper-maker's mark, at bottom right corner, perpendicular to drawing and upside-down: anchor flanked by letters H & L on either side, inscribed in a circle.  The band of the circle reads clockwise from top: PAPIERS A DESSIN / BRISTOLS.
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner (perpendicular to drawing): 8; at bottom right corner (perpendicular to drawing) 9; at bottom right corner of drawing: chateau de Coucy / June 1st 1887 / from the gate.
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding depicting a very lightly sketched view of the towers of Château de Coucy.  The château appears to sit up on a hill with very little vegetation in front of it.  Trees are visible at the rear of the castle.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Château de Coucy", June 1, 1887.Graphite on gray paperboard tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-182.
